body.name: LINSY HOME Farmhouse 6 Drawers Dresser, White Wood Dresser for Bedroom Wide Chest of Drawers, French Country Storage Double Dressers Organizer for Bedroom, Living Room
features: FANCY WOOD ALERT - Fashioned with eco-friendly manufactured wood that's so clean, LINSY HOME dresser for bedroom practically flosses its own splinters. Your well-being? We're all about it. This dresser's got a waterproof vibe thanks to its super-secret sealing process, ensuring a slick surface that's tougher than a weekend warrior.

TIME MACHINE NOT INCLUDED - LINSY HOME dresser's got lines so elegant, they're practically swiping right on your eyeballs. Framed drawer fronts and posh pull handles bring more charm than a stand-up comic at a cat convention.

STUFF HOARDER'S PARADISE - Behold, the almighty organizer of chaos! With 6 roomy drawers, this white wonderland can gobble up everything from socks to sippy cups, and even those mystery items lurking in the abyss. Bedroom? Sure. This magical portal of tidiness doubles as a TV stand too. (FYI: The top can handle up to 66lbs, so don't stage a dance party up there.)

ROCK-SOLID AWESOMENESS - This dresser's got a thicker build than a Shakespearean tragedy. The wooden frame and burly panels give it more stability than a cat meme on the internet. It's basically the Hercules of dressers – no weird wobbles or "hey, I used to be straight" curves after a few years. Dimension-wise, we're talking 15.7"D x 47.2"W x 31.2"H of pure majesty.

DRESSER DEFENSE SQUAD - We've included a wall anchor kit because dressers tipping over are so last season. Drawer danger? Not on our watch. Smooth metal runners in each drawer partnered with safety stops mean no rogue drawers trying to escape. And don't worry, we've even thrown in the hardware and assembly instructions – though we strongly suggest an electric screwdriver and a dynamic duo for maximum furniture-fu.

Does the product come with installation instructions? Instruction manual is included in the package. The latest PDF version instruction manual can be found under the product description section of this page (Installation Manual (PDF)), and we recommend that you follow this version of manual. What is assembly like? Easy/difficult? Assembly is straightforward, but there are quite a few pieces which makes it seem more daunting. Most challenging parts? What tools are required and how many hands? We recommend that you prepare a electric screwdriver and a hammer. It takes about 2 hours for someone with installation experience to assemble it. Some steps may require two people to complete. What should I do if the parts are missing/damaged during installation? Don't worry, we will send you the replacement immediately if any parts are damaged either during delivery or the installation process. Just feel free to let us know, our staff will reply to you within 24 hours.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pleased with the results
reviews.reviewText: I found this dresser easy to assemble, and instructions were clear. The back boards and ends are the heaviest, so someone helped me when it came to the final stage of assembly, but I was able to assemble most of it downstairs and finish it upstairs in the final space. One of the drawers is only opening halfway, so I will need to troubleshoot that. Otherwise, the rest works well; looks really nice in the room; is sturdy; and provides ample storage. It perfectly met what I needed storage-wise. I wanted the height, drawer depth, and dimensions that this dresser offered that I couldn’t find in similar models, but I did decide to change out the hardware from black handles to brass ones as shown in the photo. The distance for the drawer pulls was 3 3/4”. All in all, I was happy with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Definitely needs two people to assemble, sturdy as anything, good quality
reviews.reviewText: Not a some assembly required project for people who don’t do them often…orientation of each piece is really important. Instructions are very good. Be gentle with screws and connectors if you need to readjust parts. Was impressed with final dresser.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Easy to assemble, spacious, good quality, and beautiful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Value for Money
reviews.reviewText: The table is sturdy and the drawers have plenty of space. It took my husband about an hour to assemble and came with a drawer sorter that was a nice bonus. Overall I’m really happy with my purchase and I think they’re a good value for the price.I took two stars off initially because I bought two of these as end tables for my bedroom. One of them was missing the bottom piece. We tried calling the number on the box for any after market concerns but the number rang one time and then the call ended. We also left a message on the contact us but got no response.I used Amazon to request a new part and customer service was fantastic. They quickly replaced the incomplete dresser. We have both tables set up and I’m extremely happy with my purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Disappointed With Quality
reviews.reviewText: This is a great dresser until I realized it took me 4 hours to put together and one drawer track was bent, the handles cannot be screwed in (asking for replacement from company website), the drawers don’t fit seamlessly, they either go in too far or stick out or are lopsided, and one of the screws would not screw in straight for the life of me. I like the material and the look, but I’m disappointed with the quality of the manufacturer. Hoping I will get replacement parts because I really like this dresser and don’t have the desire to tear it apart and return it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dresser looks Great! Better than expected.
reviews.reviewText: Though there were many parts to put together, the directions were good. Hubby and I put it together in about an hour. Drawers pull in and out with a breeze. Dresser is all composite wood but again looks great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars You get what you pay for...
reviews.reviewText: Edit: A replacement handle has not been sent and it appears that the seller is stonewalling me. Not worth the grief.I spent $230 on this dresser. Thought it was the nicest looking one for the price. Loved that it had real rails for the drawers to glide on. The package arrived in mostly good shape. All items included.There are some quality controll issues.1: The screw holes for the rails and drawers are not perfectly drilled. I had to rearrange my 6 drawers so that they would not grind along eachother. I'm lucky I found an arrangement that worked smoothly.2: The black material over the wood flakes off. I've had to use both a sharpie and black electrical tape to cover up wood spots to keep the material on. This is a small issue.3: The threading on the drawer handles were not adequate to be held in by a screw. 2 months after the purchase I'm still stuck with a drawer without a handle. I reached out to their customer service who had replacement handles sent in 2 weeks. Only they were the wrong color... They then apologized and said they would send the correct handles but it's almost been 3 weeks now. We'll see what happens.Tldr: I actually like this thing and am not upset with the $230 I spent on it. I knew it wouldn't be perfect, but it's so much better than what I had before. Looks great too. I recommend it if you're willing to cover up a few flaws.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Gave 4 stars because of the price.
reviews.reviewText: Don't expect high end furniture and you'll be fine! For a dresser under $300 you would be shopping at garage sales or places like Walmart, so I didn't have high expectations. I've put together and restored a lot of furniture so first tip, if you're wanting a sturdier piece use wood glue when assembling. (That being said, if you aren't confident in putting together your own furniture, make sure it's assembled correctly and then reassemble with wood glue.) The drawer pulls are cheap crap (same quality as disposable silverware) so I will be buying new drawer pulls. The drawers slide nicely, the beveled edges make it feel more expensive, there were a few tiny scratches but no significant damage or anything noticable from a few feet away. I really gave this item 4 stars because for the price you probably won't find anything nicer unless it's gently used. For what I need I'm happy with it.
